<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/projects/{project_id}/labels/{pk}/"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Partially update an existing label's properties like name, color, or description.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
